text: Spanking the Monkey is a 1994 American black comedy movie. It is about incest, masturbation and troublesome relationships. The movie was a box office success. It won several independent movie awards. == Other websites == * Category:1990s black comedy movies Category:1994 comedy-drama movies Category:American comedy-drama movies Category:English-language movies Category:Incest in movies Category:American independent movies Category:Movies directed by David O. Russell Category:1994 independent movies
title: Spanking the Monkey
